markdown:
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The workshop is the heart of the research effort at [Sayuka](/sayuka/), where the brightest minds of Rauatai work to unlock the secrets of the Archipelago - and more. The coralmasons try to uncover the secret of the coral growing so large in the vicinity of the island, while the engineers are... Well, the engineers are engineering a submarine. 

## Points of interest

* A single, large room with coralmasons and engineers. Once you've delivered [Iverra](/iverra/), she will immediately correct the coralmason who tries to kick you are that you are, in fact, an invited guest. If [Overgrowth](/overgrowth/) is active, she will also provide you with [Diving Equipment](/divingEquipment/) to reach [Cignath Mór](/cignathMor/).

## Characters

* [Hetu](/hetu/), an employee of the RDC and assistant to Iverra.

'''After [A Matter of Import](/aMatterOfImport/)'''
* [Iverra](/iverra/), scientist

## Gallery

<gallery mode=nolines widths=200px>
PE2_Workshop_Sayuka_Exterior.png | Building exterior
</gallery>
